title: Chocolate, Almond and Coconut Cookies
ingredients: ['225g butter', '300g caster sugar', '220g dark brown soft sugar', '4 eggs', '4 teaspoons vanilla extract', '560g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon salt', '840g plain chocolate chips', '185g desiccated coconut', '215g chopped almonds']
